Room.Name: Trantori's Portico
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the portico outside Trantori's Summer Home. Clouds surround you.
Room.LongDescription: Far below, over the edge, you can see smaller trees making up the Enchanted Forest. Looking east you see Khallazar's hut, suspended in a clearing. There seems to be a misty valley on the other side of the city wall, and occasionally great winged monsters of some sort drift through that mist. An open door leads inside to a single, large room.
